author: Felix Wiedemann
description: File created by Loxa Web site exporter. http://www.j4loxa.com/sna/gephi/plugins/index.html

graphs.name: 1_Overview
graphs.title: Network of Book Reviews in Arabic Studies
graphs.description: Overview over the network of book reviews in Arabic Studies. The blue/red/green nodes show different modularity classes within the biggest network component. The data the network is built upon is consultable at https://www.zotero.org/groups/2083482/arabic_studies_-_journal_articles_and_reviews/items/

graphs.name: 2_ModularityInGiantComponent
graphs.title: Modularity in Giant Component
graphs.description: The colors visualize different smaller modularity classes within the network's giant component. These modularity classes represent different research clusters with the following research areas.

metrics.name: Green
metrics.description: Example: Sullivan: America s Confrontation with Revolutionary Change in the Middle East 1948-1983 by William Stivers

metrics.name: Red
metrics.description: Example: Nakjavani: New Light on Nizami by Julie Scott Meisami et al

metrics.name: Violet
metrics.description: Example: Lory: Le Prêtre et le Prophète. Aux sources du Coran by Joseph Azzi, Maurice S. Garnier

metrics.name: Orange
metrics.value: Arabic Literature, Arabic Linguistics, Semitic Studies
metrics.description: Example: Larcher: Grammar and Linguistics by Yasir Suleiman

metrics.name: Blue
metrics.value: History of the MENA region, Middle East Politics
metrics.description: Example: Al-Ali: The Scourging of Iraq: Sanctions, Law and Natural Justice by Geoff Simons

metrics.name: Silver
metrics.description: Example: Brooke: Verbs and War Scroll: Studies in the Hebrew Verbal System and the Qumran War Scroll (Studia Semitica Upsaliensia 25) by Soren Holst.

metrics.name: Black
metrics.description: Example: Guzmán: Granada. A Novel by Radwa Ashour et al.

graphs.name: 3_Journals
graphs.title: Network of Journals
graphs.description: The colors represent different journals. Each node (researcher) was colored with the color of the journal he/she wrote the most articles for.

graphs.name: 4_MutualEdges
graphs.title: Reciprocal Reviews
graphs.description: This network visualizes all the reciprocal reviews where each researcher both reviewed another researcher and was reviewed by him/her.
